entry.title: [SQ] When looking at an url for a potentially sketchy website, which end should I be
entry.content:
When looking at an url for a potentially sketchy website, which end should I be looking at- the front or the back? In other words, the
>www.microsoft...
or the
>...microsoft.com/
?
I'm assuming at least one end can show legitimacy at a glance. I saw [this gif](https://i.redd.it/sgp2jxdqmte91.gif) recently and got curious.
